comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Small correction - the newspaper report describes the race as a "14 footer dingey [sic] handicap". The skipper was J. M. Firth.

comment.author: 7806261@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia]  Yep, that's a 14ft dinghy, with four sails set. Even has the spinnaker  clew sheeted to windward of the mast.

Terrific action shot ANMS, the detail is fantastic!
